vuln_description: Fix various sendfile issues.
Prevent user passwords appearing in log files if a runtime exception (e.g. OOME) occurs while creating a new user for a MemoryUserDatabase via JMX.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50325 Use JVM provided solutions to CVE-2009-3555 if available (i.e. RFC 5746 support)
Multiple XSS in Manager web application
Prevent possible disclosure of host name or IP address via the HTTP WWW-Authenticate header when using BASIC or DIGEST authentication.
Fix potential XSS in host-manager. This is CVE-2008-1947.
Fix XSS issue in Manager and Host Manager. This is CVE-2007-2450.
DoS with malformed Content-Type header and multipart request processing. Update to latest code (r1565163) from Commons FileUpload

Merged revision 1203091 from tomcat/trunk: - Align %2f handling (aka CVE-2007-0450 fix) between implementations of UDecoder.convert(). - Make convert(MessageBytes) to consistently throw an IOException
column6: even if it calls convert(String). (convert(String) and convert(CharChunk) are rare cases with little impact and inherent bug: hardcoded handling of %xx as ISO-8859-1). Updated changelog.

vuln_description: Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51698 Fix CVE-2011-3190 Prevent AJP request forgery via unread request body packet
When running under a security manager and using sendfile
column6: validate sendfile attributes to prevent sendfile being used to bypass the security manager. Part of the fix for CVE-2011-2526

vuln_description: Prevent user passwords appearing in log files if a runtime exception (e.g. OOME) occurs while creating a new user for a MemoryUserDatabase via JMX.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51395 Better fix for memory leak that aligns ContextConfig with TldConfig Fix part 3 of 3 for CVE-2011-2481
Use the correct classloader This is the fix for CVE-2011-1582
Add additional configuration options to the DIGEST authenticator This is the fix for CVE-2011-1184

Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=12428 Add optional support for preemptive authentication on a per context basis Based on a patch suggested by Werner Donn This includes the fix for CVE-2011-1183

Protect against things going wrong during access logging. An un-handled exception here could trigger some unexpected code paths. Possible contributing factor to https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50957 ? This is part of the fix for CVE-2011-1475
Fix unit test failures
Improve HTTP specification compliance This works-around the Oracle JVM bug that triggers a DoS. CVE-2010-4476.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50631 InternalNioInputBuffer should honor maxHttpHeadSize This addresses CVE-2011-0534
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50325 Use JVM provided solutions to CVE-2009-3555 if available (i.e. RFC 5746 support)
Prevent XSS in Manager application This addresses CVE-2011-0013
Multiple XSS in Manager web application
Ensure work dir attribute is made read-only CVE-2010-3718
Return copies of the URL array rather than the original. This facilitated CVE-2010-1622 although the root cause was in the Spring Framework. Returning a copy in this case seems like a good idea.
Arrange filter logic. This is the fix for CVE-2010-2227.
Prevent possible disclosure of host name or IP address via the HTTP WWW-Authenticate header when using BASIC or DIGEST authentication.

Remove 3 of the essentially 4 duplicate normalise implementations. Minor tweaks where required to use the new single implementation. Remove unnecessary normalisation calls. This includes the fix for CVE-2008-5515.
Fix potential XSS in host-manager. This is CVE-2008-1947.
DoS with malformed Content-Type header and multipart request processing. Update to latest code (r1565159) from Commons FileUpload

Add an option to the Context to control the blocking of XML external entities when parsing XML configuration files and enable this blocking by default. The block is implemented via a custom resolver to enable the logging of any blocked entities. This is the fix for CVE-2013-4590.
Improve parsing of trailing headers This is part of the fix for CVE-2013-4322.
Better adherence to RFC2616 for content-length headers This is the fix for CVE-2013-4286.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51698 Fix CVE-2011-3190 Prevent AJP request forgery via unread request body packet
When running under a security manager and using sendfile
column6: validate sendfile attributes to prevent sendfile being used to bypass the security manager. Part of the fix for CVE-2011-2526

vuln_description: Prevent user passwords appearing in log files if a runtime exception (e.g. OOME) occurs while creating a new user for a MemoryUserDatabase via JMX.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51395 Better fix for memory leak that aligns ContextConfig with TldConfig Fix part 3 of 3 for CVE-2011-2481
Use the correct classloader This is the fix for CVE-2011-1582
Add additional configuration options to the DIGEST authenticator This is the fix for CVE-2011-1184

Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=12428 Add optional support for preemptive authentication on a per context basis Based on a patch suggested by Werner Donn This includes the fix for CVE-2011-1183

Protect against things going wrong during access logging. An un-handled exception here could trigger some unexpected code paths. Possible contributing factor to https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50957 ? This is part of the fix for CVE-2011-1475
Fix unit test failures
Improve HTTP specification compliance This works-around the Oracle JVM bug that triggers a DoS.
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50631 InternalNioInputBuffer should honor maxHttpHeadSize This addresses CVE-2011-0534
Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50325 Use JVM provided solutions to CVE-2009-3555 if available (i.e. RFC 5746 support)
Prevent XSS in Manager application This addresses CVE-2011-0013
Multiple XSS in Manager web application
Ensure work dir attribute is made read-only CVE-2010-3718
Return copies of the URL array rather than the original. This facilitated CVE-2010-1622 although the root cause was in the Spring Framework. Returning a copy in this case seems like a good idea.
Arrange filter logic. This is the fix for CVE-2010-2227.
Prevent possible disclosure of host name or IP address via the HTTP WWW-Authenticate header when using BASIC or DIGEST authentication.

Remove 3 of the essentially 4 duplicate normalise implementations. Minor tweaks where required to use the new single implementation. Remove unnecessary normalisation calls. This includes the fix for CVE-2008-5515.
Fix potential XSS in host-manager. This is CVE-2008-1947.
Fix XSS issue in Manager and Host Manager. This is CVE-2007-2450.
Protect initialization of ResourceLinkFactory when running with a SecurityManager. This is the fix for CVE-2016-0763
When using the new sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter
column6: apply the filter earlier rather than loading the class and then deciding to filter it out. When a SecurityManager is used
column7: enable filtering by default. This is part 2 of 2 of the fix for CVE-2016-0714

vuln_description: Fix https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58809 Correctly recycle the cookies when mapping requests for parallel deployment This is part 2 of 2 of the fix for CVE-2015-5346
Additional fix for BZ 58660 When Mapper root redirect is enabled
column6: ensure '/' is added to path for redirect This is part 3 of 3 of the fix for CVE-2015-5345

vuln_description: More normalization edge cases This is part 2 of 2 of the fix for CVE-2015-5174
Remove some more unnecessary code. This is part of the fix for CVE-2014-7810
Add a new limit
column7: for the amount of data Tomcat will swallow for an aborted upload. This is the fix for CVE-2014-0230

vuln_description: i18n for ChunkedInputFilter error message Add error flag to allow subsequent attempts at reading after an error to fail fast This is the fix for CVE-2014-0227
Fix possible overflow when parsing long values from a byte array. This is the fix for CVE-2014-0099
Prevent user supplied XSLTs from defining external entities This is part 2 of 2 of the fix for CVE-2014-0096

Correct regression introduced in 8.0.0-RC2 as part of the Servlet 3.1 non-blocking IO support that broke handling of requests with an explicit content length of zero. This is the fix for CVE-2014-0095
Improve processing of chuck size from chunked headers. Avoid overflow and use a bit shift instead of a multiplication as it is marginally faster. This is the fix for CVE-2014-0075
DoS with malformed Content-Type header and multipart request processing. Update to latest code (r1565159) from Commons FileUpload

Add an option to the Context to control the blocking of XML external entities when parsing XML configuration files and enable this blocking by default. The block is implemented via a custom resolver to enable the logging of any blocked entities. This is the fix for CVE-2013-4590.
Improve parsing of trailing headers This is part of the fix for CVE-2013-4322.
Better adherence to RFC2616 for content-length headers This is the fix for CVE-2013-4286.
Protect against crashes in the HTTP APR connector if sendfile is configured to send more data than is available in the file. Part of the fix for CVE-2011-2526
